A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely enjoyable. Great tension\, a variety of twists\, and instantly one of my favorites of the series. I’m disappointed only in the people who are so critical. This is a franchise with unbelievably high expectations\, and it’s easy to forget that the higher one’s expectations are\, the lower the results will be. The dynamics between Kylo and Rei in this story are what pushed it to be one of my favorites. I won’t spoil that here\, though\, but it is incredible. The story is a tough journey because the good guys keep losing\, and there’s so much to be worried about. That’s what makes for an excellent 2nd installment. To be fair\, the conclusion of the new trilogy will be the ultimate factor in determining the value of The Last Jedi. But on its own\, A+. Fantastic character development all around. This movie is also about creating new leaders in the franchise\, and we get to see those characters grow here.
